segments.text: Good morning , Japan Airline domestic reservations . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I Would like make a reservation to Huston for tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The flight to Huston takes off daily every two hours from 6:00 to 11:00 pm . So you don't need a reservation . Seats are available on a ' first come , first served ' basis .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's quite convenient . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
